title: AbocoFur 180 Degree Adjustable Zero Gravity Chair for 500lbs, Steel Frame Folding Heavy Duty Lounge Chair with Armrest, Indoor&Outdoor Textil Fabric Chaise Recliner for Courtyard, Patio, Orange
features: This recliner can be adjusted 180 degrees to lie flat.The angle can be easily adjusted by pulling up the armrest,9-level adjustment is possible.It has an S-shaped curve and is ergonomically designed.The flexible seat angle and widened armrest can bring you a comfortable sleep experience
Steel frame structure and anti-skid foot pad make it stable,with a maximum load of 500 pounds.The powder coating on the surface is waterproof and rust proof,easy to clean
The seat surface is made of flexible,anti-ultraviolet textile fabric,which is waterproof,easy to clean,not easy to age,and durable

It can resist the influence of bad weather and can be used indoors and outdoors.It can be used as a patio folding chair,a balcony chair,an office rest chair,and it can also be used at the beach or camping
No need to assemble,flexible folding,space saving,easy to move and carry
